ConfirmChangeEmail.ConfirmChangeEmailSuccessBody: You have successfully changed the email for the user {0} to the email {1}. All emails will be directed at this new email address.
ConfirmChangeEmail.Explanation: Please provide your password and your two factor token (if you have 2FA enabled) to complete the changing of your email to {0}.
ConfirmChangeEmail.FetchingConfirmChangeEmailBody: A request is currently being made to change your email.  This shouldn’t take too long.  Please wait.

ConfirmRegister.ConfirmRegisterSuccessBody: You have successfully confirmed the username {0} and the email {1}. You may now proceed to login.
ConfirmRegister.FetchingConfirmUserBody: A request is currently being made to confirm your registration.  This shouldn’t take too long.  Please wait.

Error.ChangeEmailTokenNotFound: Change email token is not found.  This is probably because you already accepted this link or you copied the link incorrectly.
Error.EmailsAreTheSame: The email {0} is the current email for the account. Please choose a different email.
Error.EmailTaken: The email {0} has been taken. Please create an account with a different email address.
Error.InvalidConfirmUserToken: The token for create the user account does not exist.  This can be because you have already confirmed the registratoin of the user.  If so please simply attempt to login to confirm.
Error.InvalidUrl: The website url is malformed.  This could be because you miscopied the url link improperly.  People double check.
Error.InvalidUser: The user submitted is invalid.  Please refresh the page and try again.
Error.NoGetTwoFactorTokenRequestMade: No request has been made to generate a two factor authentication token.
Error.UsernamesAreTheSame: The username {0} is the current username for the account. Please choose a different username.
Error.UsernameTaken: The username {0} has been taken. Please create an account with a different username.
Error.UserNotFoundChangeEmail: The user for this request has since been deleted.
Error.UserNotFoundForgotPassword: The username/email {0} does not exist within our system. Please create an account with this username/email if you wish by clicking on register.
Error.WithdrawalAmountTooHigh: The withdrawal amount entered is too high.  Pleas make sure you have sufficient funds.
Error.WithdrawalRequestNotFound: The withdrawal request is not found.  This could be because the withdrawal has already been processed or you copied the url for the request incorrectly.

ForgotPassword.ConfirmForgotPasswordSuccess: You have successfully changed the password for the user {0}. You may now proceed to login with the new password.

Generic.BusinesQuote: Lightning Futures Exchange enables to you to anonymously long or short futures for a vast number of equities with low trading fees all at high leverage with the power of bitcoin.  Register today, make a deposit and gain access to trade the world’s markets anonymously.
Generic.CallToActionCard: Register today and trade futures of global equities anonymously with bitcoin and with high leverage.
Generic.ChangeEmailSuccess: You have successfully submitted a request to change the email for the user {0} to {1}. Please check your email address to confirm this email belongs to you.
Generic.ChangePasswordSuccess: You have successfully changed the password for the user {0}. From now on, please use the new password for authentication.
Generic.ChangeUsernameSuccess: You have successfully changed the username for your account from {0} to {1}. Your old username is no longer valid and can be taken by other users.
Generic.CloseWithoutSavingConfigBody: There are some unsaved changes to the config.  Do you wish to close without saving? Hit “No” to continue editing.
Generic.ForgotPasswordSuccess: Successfully submitted request to change your password.  Please check your email for link to change your password.
Generic.Name: Name
Generic.NoDepositAddresses: There currently aren’t any deposit addresses.
Generic.NoWithdrawals: No withdrawals have currently been made.
Generic.RegisterSuccess: You have successfully registered the username {0}. Please check your email {1} to confirm. It may take several minutes for you to receive this email.

RequestWithdrawal.CancelWithdrawalSuccessBody: You have successfully cancelled the withdrawal for {0} BTC to the address {1}.
RequestWithdrawal.ConfirmWithdrawalSuccessBody: You have successfully confirmed the withdrawal for {0} BTC to the address {1}.
RequestWithdrawal.ExplanationCancel: Please provide your password and your two factor token (if you have 2FA enabled) to cancel the withdrawal.
RequestWithdrawal.ExplanationConfirm: Please provide your password and your two factor token (if you have 2FA enabled) to confirm the withdrawal.
RequestWithdrawal.RequestSuccess: An email has been successfully sent to you asking to confirm the withdrawal for the amount of {0} BTC to the address {1}. Please check your email to confirm or cancel the withdrawal request.
RequestWithdrawal.ResendRequestSuccess: You have successfully resent the withdrawal request.  Please check your email.
RequestWithdrawal.ResendRequestError: There was an error resending the withdrawal request.  Perhaps the withdrawal has already been confirmed or cancelled.

Validation.PleaseEnter2FA: Please enger a 6 digit 2FA or leave blank if your account does not have 2FA.
Validation.PleaseEnterBitcoinAddress: Please enter a valid bitcoin address.
Validation.PleaseEnterBitcoinAmount: Please enter an amount of bitcoin to withdraw.
Validation.PleaseEnterNewPassword: Please enter your new password of minimum length 8.
Validation.PleaseEnterNewUsername: Please enter a valid new alphanumeric username of length 6.
Validation.PleaseEnterPassword: Please enter your password of minimum length 8.
Validation.PleaseEnterUsername: Please enter your alphanumeric username of minimum length 6.
Validation.PleaseEnterUsernameOrEmail: Please enter your alphanumeric username of minimum length 6 or your email address.
